attributes.action: Close down and suspend all Sporting Events in UK due to Corona Virus COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Ultimately we need to stop the virus spreading. Fans lives and healths are at risk. Options are to delay or suspend all games.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to suspend all games and fans gathering to eliminate / reduce the risk of this Virus. We need to speak with all the sporting governing bodies to take the necessary precautions as peoples lives are at serious risk.
